news.title: Abercrombie & Fitch soars 25% even as retailer slashes profit outlook due to tariffs
news.summary: Abercrombie & Fitch's growth is slowing at its namesake brand. The company is expecting tariffs to reduce its earnings by $50 million.

news.title: Elon Musk says Trump's spending bill undermines the work DOGE has been doing
news.summary: Musk criticized the Republican spending bill that recently made it through the House. Musk criticized the GOP spending bill as a waste of money. He also criticized the way it was written.

news.title: Joby Aviation shares pop 13% as electric air taxi maker closes $250 million Toyota investment
news.summary: Joby has received the first $250 million of a $500 million investment from Toyota to support its air taxis. Joby announced that it received thefirst $250m of a first $500m investment fromToyota.

news.title: GameStop shares rise as retailer meme stock buys first bitcoin batch, scooping up $500 million
news.summary: The purchase, GameStop's first investment in bitcoin, was worth $512.6 million with bitcoin's price of $108,837 Wednesday.

news.title: Hybrid leader Toyota targets major growth in plug-in vehicles amid industry's EV uncertainty
news.summary: Toyota plans to increase PHEVs from 2.4% last year to roughly 20% of its U.S. sales volume by 2030.

news.title: Macy’s isn’t ‘broadly increasing price’ amid tariffs and will eat some costs
news.summary: “We’re being incredibly surgical about the situation with tariffs,” said Macy’s Chief Financial Officer Adrian Mitchell.

news.title: After 25 years, I finally asked for separate checks — and my friends iced me out. Did I do something terrible?
news.summary: “With each year I got angrier and angrier, so it was time to move on,” he said. “With every year I became more and more angry.”

news.title: Abercrombie’s stock back in rally mode as outlook shows tariffs won’t hurt sales
news.summary: Hollister reports a big jump in Hollister sales and an improved sales-growth outlook. Stock heads for best day in two years after a quarterly earnings beat.

news.title: The ‘TACO trade’ is the talk of Wall Street. Here’s one way to play it.
news.summary: The ‘TACO trade’ has captured the mood as investors and analysts attempt to make sense of the roller-coaster market action.

news.title: The best scenario for 2025 is stocks go nowhere, says this strategist. Here’s where he says to camp out instead.
news.summary: Fidelity Investments’ Jurrien Timmer calls this a “damned-if-you-do-market,” that’s setting up for a rangebound 2025.
